column5: Woke up at 05:00AM   this morning thanks to my 2 boys (2 dogs), that started growling at the window ......there must have been another animal around the area or some drunk ice fisherman staggering home from an all nighter for them to growl like that!!!   ....  Anyway, made a quick coffee and headed out to the ice shack for an early start......I could see the clouds moving out and a nice front with clear skies moving in...THE BITE WAS ON!!!  ..after a few hours of steady bites and a few keepers, I started gettin a tad hungry and decided to come in at 10:00AM for some breakfast....  Here's a few pics to share with you all.....      Hopefully the afternoon bite will be just as good!!!!!
Nice stuff Steve.... T- shirt weather eh... GCD would be proud! LOL
Thats a good way to spend the morning nice looking fish  rob

LOL Wayne.....The woodstove that's in my shack is an overkill to say the least....It's rated to heat an 1800sq' garage...I was melting in there this morning  Here's a few shots of my home away from home
That's a dandy Walleye there!
You won't have any fogged up winders with that stove.  The axe is the type I used to use when I used to venture out on 1st Ice.  Really like yer accomodations.
nice report, thanks for posting.
Can't think of a better way to spend a Sunday morning.  Very nice on-ice accomodations you have there.  Looks pretty comfy.  Cheers  Craig
OK thats it, when is dinner and when are we fishing!
LOL...anytime you're free Jamie....I know Badger Shark is dying to get out so maybe I'll try to set up a small swill before March....
Nice fish and setup you have there. Looks quite comfy.  Thanks for the report and pics.
Nice report & great catch !!!!.  ..the good olde ottawa river ,she always produces,well done    cheers
Nice Ice 'eye.  Beauty setup you got there.  Thanks for the report  reefrunner
I got the message! lol.  You caught some nice fish!  Cool set-up there and some fresh walleye, hard to beat a morning like that.
Somebody said swill... maybe I need to visit my mother in SF....
Nice Catch, That walleye made me think of what was left in the freezer before the freeze up. Nice set up you have there.
Looks like ya had a good time on the ice there... Thanks for sharing the pics, some very nice fish indeed
Count me in for the swill...!
Now that's livin'  Nice fish!
Nice fish!. Hope we get some like that this weekend.
